desc: Invisible Clock ll is a multi function personal timer and alarm clock. Meditation timer, client session timer,presentation and meeting management, medical reminders, travel clock, multiple alarms, vibrate or beep, ADHD/ADA management, exercise timer, weight shifting timer, cooking timer, Yoga timer, speech timer.

layout.text: Use any of the 12 alarms or the timer to manage your time and get ahead in life.
